channel.title: Agar.io
channel.description:
Is anyone here playing a game called Agar (or Agario, if that's the name of it)?
Anyway, it's an addictive MMO-game, where you're a cell (as in biology) and your goal is to grow by absorbing other cells. You can play individually or in teams.
The website is: agar.io
Here's an image from when I recently played in a team and we won the entire game:
[url=http://postimg.org/image/la5p2ziuf/full/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/o48ugfl0r/Agario.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/index.php?lang=spanish]share image[/url]

item.title: Agar.io
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:26, topic:551547”][quote author=object link=topic=670463.msg4483502#msg4483502 date=1432149979]

  1. If you’re chased (and maybe even trapped close to a wall), you can flee easier by splitting your cells. Then you’re also able to pass through the cells that split larger cells.
  2. To chase someone else, simply split your cells if you’re large enough. That way you’re shooting your cells at your opponent.
  3. If you’re in a team, consider using your mass reduction-techniques to help your larger team mates get that damn opponent cell.
    [/quote]
  4. When surrounded, try to float right in the middle of the enemies. Even if they capture you, they’ll have eachother to worry about.
  5. You can use W as a bait.
  6. You can use W on the germs that split biggies to make them larger. At a certain point, if they’re big enough, your last W will cast a second germ in the direction you are shooting effectively turning it into a projectile.
  7. Split your cell when someone else uses his split offensively.
    8. Position yourself to cause chain reactions when splitting. This way you can get enemies you normally couldn’t.[/quote]
  8. If someone is chasing you, and you judge his cell is pretty close to your in size, don’t worry. He really cannot do anything.
  9. If someone is chasing you, and you judge his cell is a bit bigger than your, but not that much, don’t worry too much if you’re a bit in front of his. If he split, his cell probably won’t be able to consume your.
  10. If you have a few cells, try to capture another cell in the middle of yours. When your cells merge, they will consume his cell.

Read full topic

item.title: Agar.io
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“object, post:25, topic:551547”]1. If you’re chased (and maybe even trapped close to a wall), you can flee easier by splitting your cells. Then you’re also able to pass through the cells that split larger cells.
2. To chase someone else, simply split your cells if you’re large enough. That way you’re shooting your cells at your opponent.
3. If you’re in a team, consider using your mass reduction-techniques to help your larger team mates get that damn opponent cell. ;)[/quote]
4. When surrounded, try to float right in the middle of the enemies. Even if they capture you, they’ll have eachother to worry about.
5. You can use W as a bait.
6. You can use W on the germs that split biggies to make them larger. At a certain point, if they’re big enough, your last W will cast a second germ in the direction you are shooting effectively turning it into a projectile.
7. Split your cell when someone else uses his split offensively.
8. Position yourself to cause chain reactions when splitting. This way you can get enemies you normally couldn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Agar.io
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

  1. If you’re chased (and maybe even trapped close to a wall), you can flee easier by splitting your cells. Then you’re also able to pass through the cells that split larger cells.
  2. To chase someone else, simply split your cells if you’re large enough. That way you’re shooting your cells at your opponent.
  3. If you’re in a team, consider using your mass reduction-techniques to help your larger team mates get that damn opponent cell.

Read full topic

item.title: Agar.io
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Anyone have any tactics for this? I get to a decent amount of points then get chased down by big blobs that eventually get me

I found the best thing to do is when you are getting chased, is find the Green Poison blob things, and shoot your mass at it, and it will become big and split in the direction you are shooting it, and you can use it to hit the bigger blob which will then make them break up into smaller pieces, and you just run in and attack. Works like 75% of the time for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Agar.io
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I got to #7 on the US West servers and then randomly got reset… I don’t even get why it happen.
Just 1 second I’m taking names, the next I’m back to the starting blob size (And no, I didn’t get eaten as it never took me to the screen to change servers/names)
Edit: Wait… It moved me servers, because the list of people on the server it put me on is not the same list as the one I was on… Rude as fuck

Read full topic
